site_name: DEVELOPMENT AT LAND ON THE EAST SIDE OF CRAVEN GARDENS AND REAR OF 1 TO 16
description: Discharge of conditions for approved permission 1504/22: Construction Management Plan and Logistic Plan (Condition 4); Walls and Fences (Condition 5); Sustainable Drainage Systems (SUDs) (Condition 6); Refuse storage facilities (Condition 7); Cycle parking (Condition 8); Parking Permit Exempt (Condition 9); Hard and Soft Landscaping (Condition 10); and Fire Safety (Condition 12). (Summary).

in accordance with
